none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2013-09-crucial-macabre/extracted/crucial macabre/02 I Thought You Liked Getting Fucked Up

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on September 16, 2013 Description from Terminal Escape:
There's nothing fancy here, but Syracuse's CRUCIAL MACABRE are just relentless. Searing hardcore delivered with absolute precision and maximum effect - I might say something like "they don't make 'em like this anymore," but instead I will just say that I'm glad they still do... CRUCIAL PUNISHMENT
//4.bp.blogspot.com/-XouTP2iIUOw/UjZbSu-t_4I/AAAAAAAAIo0/5pvdfT6r4tQ/s1600/crucial+macabre+copy.jpg
